entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 70%
